name: let's build an island in the sky
name_original: let's build an island in the sky
description:
-Bedtime! I'll be online again during the day tomorrow. You can still log on and build the island, there's just less of a chance of somebody else being online with you. Surprise me with the state of the island when I wake up!-

Just a tiny little collaborative toy, hopefully allowing players to make some connections with each other.

I didn't have all weekend, so I had to scope down pretty severely. I still think it came out pretty cute.

If you are having problems connecting to the server I may have already taken it down. Contact me if you really want to give it a try.

If I'm in game we can have a chat.

Some screnshots of islands made by players:
